description:
Urameshi Yuusuke is known to be a stereotypical bad seed; having a spotty attendance record, doing poorly in class, and picking fights with many other students. He also smokes cigarettes and drinks alcohol in the manga.
He dies after saving a small child from being struck by a car, which is something the guardians of the afterlife did not predict. Koenma allows Botan to becoming Yuusuke`s guide for the Ordeal that he must undergo in order to be brought back to life, as well as help show him that he is actually a good person. He is then forced to become a Spirit Detective who protects the human race from demons.
name: Urameshi Yuusuke
